page.title: 11 My favourite toy.
page.content: My best toy is my computer.You can do lots of things with it and the pieces you need are a disc drive and discs or a cassette recorder and cassettes,a T.V. or moniter and a keyboard. My cassettes are called Sphinx adventu- re,Firebug,Chess,Hunchback,Weetabix and Intro.A computer is electronic and you press buttons and the words come up on the screen.Weetabix is a sort of space invaders .You work Dunk who is a Weeta- bix man and he blasts little green aliens with torpedoes.At the end of the game it tells you how many points you have got.
